name: test_NAF_3_7_0_change_stage
description:
Test Case: NAF-73 - NAF 81, random stage change
    As a registered user I can edit my current stage
    Scenario: Change Stage
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in   
    2. Go to "My Profile" button
    3. Click on "Edit" button
    4. Click on "Stage" button
    5. Click on "Change" button
    6. Verify stage is changed
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-73 - NAF 81, random stage change
As a registered user I can edit my current stage
Scenario: Change Stage

Steps:
1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in   
2. Go to "My Profile" button
3. Click on "Edit" button
4. Click on "Stage" button
5. Click on "Change" button
6. Verify stage is changed

    assert perinfo_page.get_current_stage() == has_changed_stage, f"changed stage equal current stage"
pages/personal_infomation_page.py:240: in get_current_stage

    self.click_element(*self.USER_PROFILE_LOCATOR)

    element = wait.until(EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.XPATH, locator_value)))
